Title: 896: AI (Probably) Isn’t Taking Your Job (At Least Anytime Soon)
Description:
The Economist reported that global Google searches for "AI unemployment" hit an all-time high earlier this year. But do we have to worry about AI taking our jobs? In this week’s Five-Minute Friday, Jon Krohn investigates whether the rise of AI has directly led to an increase in unemployment. 


Additional materials: ⁠⁠⁠⁠www.superdatascience.com/896
